title: Enhancing Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Exploring Mathematical Concepts via Scientific Phenomena Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three mathematical patterns by observing scientific phenomena in daily life
Learners can convert scientific problem situations into mathematical modeling with 80% accuracy using a phenomenological approach
Learners share reflective thinking on science-mathematics integration with peer learners at least twice on the LMS discussion board

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
